alert.note: Alert for Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 12:23AM CST until January 25 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1222 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leakesville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chatom, Leakesville, Wagarville, Deer Park, Tibbie and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
